sentence.Network_en: In San Francisco, the dragonet is at his dwelling with Shao Ruhai.
sentence.Network_cn: 在旧金山, 小龙跟着邵如海来到他的住处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小龙（dragonet）（Dragonet）是一种不同寻常的底（bottom-dwelling ）栖鱼类，身上没有鳞片。它们有大量艳丽的鳍，宽宽的三角头使它看上去 …
... fish)、蝎鱼(scorpion fish)、龙鱼(dragonet)、海龙(pipefish)、海马(seahorse)、模仿章鱼(minic octopus)，以及各式各样的裸鳃、叶 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a small dragon): from Old French, diminutive of dragon 'dragon'

means.word_mean: 1. small often brightly colored scaleless marine bottom-dwellers; found in tropical and warm-temperate waters of Europe and America
